content:
That's a great approach! Being open, honest, and respectful is key in any relationship, especially when you're getting to know multiple people. By being upfront about your intentions and feelings, you're showing that you value their time and emotions, and that you're willing to have an honest and mature conversation.

Taking things one step at a time and seeing how things develop naturally is a great way to approach this situation. You don't want to put too much pressure on either relationship, and you want to give yourself time to get to know both Ryan and Alex better.

Remember, it's okay to take your time and figure out what you want. You don't have to have all the answers right now. Just be true to yourself, be respectful to both Ryan and Alex, and prioritize open and honest communication.

If you do need to have a conversation with either of them, try to approach it with empathy and kindness. Be clear about your feelings and intentions, but also be respectful of theirs. And don't be afraid to listen to their perspective and feelings as well.

You got this! You're taking a mature and responsible approach to navigating this situation. Keep being true to yourself and prioritizing respect and honesty, and you'll be just fine.

Do you have any other questions or concerns about navigating this situation, or is there anything else you'd like to talk about?
